title: tldrlegal Killer
description: Choose Criteria and list suitable Software licences
prompt: List all software licenses which can {can} AND cannot {cannot} AND Must {must} , Please compile the results in a {format} format with property columns

title: Grammerly Alternative
description: Correct the grammer and make it suitable to Audience
prompt: Please help me to correct the grammar of the sentence in curly braces {sentence} , make sure its suitable to a {audience} audience, {formality} tone with {purpose} purpose with intent to {intent}

title: Wordtune Alternative
description: Rewrite The Sentence
prompt: Please rephrase/rewrite the sentence contained within the curly braces using a more {formality} tone and suitable to {audience} audience. {sentence}

title: Write as a Blogger
description: Create Blog Meta data on any Topic
prompt: I want you to act as a blogger and {topic} expert. The topic of the post will be '{topicdescription}'. The length of the blog post will be around {length} words. The tone will be {tone}.I want you to include these keywords:{keywords}, Replay within format {replyformat}

{keywords}.title: Any particular keyword(s) to include (Comma Separated)

title: Topic Explainer
description: Explain Like 5 Year Old #eli5
prompt: Explain the {topic} to me, i am {year} year old and knows about {knows} and struggles with the {struggles}, provide response in markdown

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.ui:placeholder: Enter Topic you want to learn

{knows}.title: Expertise Area
{knows}.ui:placeholder: Enter your expert areas,  in comma separate format

{struggles}.title: you struggle with?
{struggles}.ui:placeholder: Enter area that you mostly stuggle ,  in comma separate format

title: UX/UI developer
description: Act as a UX/UI developer and Design
prompt: I want you to act as a UX/UI developer. I will provide some details about the design of an [type], and it will be your job to come up with creative ways to improve its user experience. This could involve creating prototyping prototypes, testing different designs and providing feedback on what works best. My first request is "I need help designing an intuitive {category} system  with primary color {colors}

title: Dream Interpreter
description: Act as a dream interpreter and provide interpretations based inputs
prompt: I want you to act as a dream interpreter. I will give you descriptions of my dreams, and you will provide interpretations based on the symbols and themes present in the dream. Do not provide personal opinions or assumptions about the dreamer. Provide only factual interpretations based on the information given. My dream is about {description1} ,  {description2} , {description3}

title: Domain name generator
description: Act as a smart domain name generator and suggest
prompt: I want you to act as a smart domain name generator. I will tell you what my {companyname} or {idea} does and you will reply me a list of domain name alternatives according to my prompt. You will only reply the domain list, and nothing else. Domains should be max {maxletters} letters, should be {preference}. Do {wantexplaination} write explanations.

preference.title: Any Preference?
preference.default: short but unique, can be catchy or non-existent words

title: Product Manager
description: Be a product manager and Write Product Development Requirement
prompt: Please respond to me as a product manager. For the {subject}, and Help me to write a PRD or requirement for it with these headers: [headers]

title: Checklist
description: Create checklist for different topic
prompt: Create a checklist for preparing for a {theme}. Please do consider {consideration}

title: Code Generation
description: Create checklist for different topic
prompt: Write '{problemstatement}' in {programminglanguage}

title: List the Competitor
description: list of competitors to business and format
prompt: Please create a list of competitors to {business}. List the name of the {fields} and whether they are a {isdirect} competitor. Please compile the results in a {format} format

fields.title: Problem Statement
fields.default: Name Of Company, headquarters, Size of Company

title: Code Explainer
description: What does this code do?
prompt: We have the following [xxx] code: ```[xxx] {codeblock} ``` Please explain {linebyline}

title: HTML Code Generator
description: HTML Code of Framework and theme?
prompt: Please share html code for {framework} {theme} {component}

title: AI Programmer
description: Write a code and explain
prompt: Write {language} {type} code for {purpose} in {style} style. Include {include}.

title: Social Media Post
description: Create a social Media Post for a feature
prompt: Create a {website} post for {purpose}. {instruction}

{purpose}.title: Purpose
{purpose}.ui:placeholder: A new dark mode feature for a running app

{style}.title: Style
{style}.ui:placeholder: Include emojis in the post. The post should be energetic and succinct. Do not use acronyms or abbreviations

title: Personal Shopper
description: Suggest items for me to purchase
prompt: I want you to act as my personal shopper. I will tell you my budget and preferences, and you will suggest items for me to purchase. You should only reply with the items you recommend, and nothing else. Do not write explanations. My first request is I have a budget of {currency}{amount} and I am looking for a {item}.

title: Stand-up Comedian
description: Humorous take on any topic
prompt: I want you to act as a stand-up comedian. I will provide you with some topics related to current events and you will use your wit, creativity, and observational skills to create a routine based on those topics. You should also be sure to incorporate personal anecdotes or experiences into the routine in order to make it more relatable and engaging for the audience. My first request is “I want a humorous take on {topic}.

title: Behind The Name
description: The etymology and history of first names
prompt: Can you please share meaning of name '{name}'.  Please output with below fields. {fields}

title: Bedtime Story
description: Personalized Kids story generation
prompt: Act as a grandma and write a bedtime story for {age} Year with length of {length} words based on {theme} theme, main character name is {name}. Moral should be around {moral}. Output should be with proper punctuation , formatting and expressive tone

title: City Chooser
description: Looking for the best city to live in
prompt: As someone looking for the best city to live in, consider these basic factors:  Interests: {interests} , Climate Preference: {climate} Monthly Budget: [budget] Good In {criteria} .Main Task: Generate a simple list of cities that align with provided interests, climate preference, living standard and budget.

{interests}.title: Interests?
{interests}.ui:placeholder: outdoor activities, arts and culture, nightlife

title: Code Improvement
description: Seeking to improve  code
prompt: As a software developer seeking to improve your code, consider the following basic aspects: Language: {lanaguage} Code Snippet: ```[xxx] {codeblock} ``` Problem or Error: {description} Main Task: Identify and address the issue in the provided code snippet to improve the code quality.

{description}.title: What improvement you looking for?
{description}.ui:placeholder: Explain the specific problem or error message you're encountering

title: Sequel Writer
description: Write a sequel/prequel about the any movie
prompt: Write a {type} about the {moviename} movie
Can you recommend a good {genre}  movie similar to {similar} for me to watch ?
title: Movie Recommendation
description: Recommend a good genre movie for me

prompt: Help me create a {typeofcontent} for {socialmediaplatform} that targets {targetaudience} with a {tone} tone and a {goal} goal.
title: Create a Social Media Post
description: Help me create post based  on  type of content , platform , target audience and goal .

{specificelement}.title: Any specific Element
{specificelement}.ui:placeholder: geometric shapes, nature elements, typography, etc.

prompt: Create a {typedesign} that appeals to a {targetaudience} audience, using {colorscheme} colors and incorporating {specificelement} element.
title: Create a Design
description: Create a for Design based on target audience , color scheme.

prompt: Please help me to create a {budgettype} budget plan for my {income} income, with {expenses} expenses, in order to achieve my financial {goal} goal.
title: Budget Planner
description: Create a budget plan based on recurrence , income, expenses, goal

prompt: What are your top {number} {category} recommendations for someone looking for {interest}?
title: Interest Recommendations
description: Recommendation based on interest

prompt: Recipe suggestions based on {dietary} restrictions for {mealtype} and  {cuisine} cuisine
title: Recipe Suggestions
description: Suggestions based on dietary restrictions for meal type and cuisine

prompt: Career advice for professionals from {industry} and {levelofexperience} level of experience with {careergoals} career goals
title: Career advice for professionals
description: Career advice based on  industry, level of experience and goals

{author}.title: Author
{author}.ui:placeholder: Stephen King, Jane Austen, George R.R. Martin

prompt: Can you recommend a good books based {genre} genre from authour {author} in  {readingformat} reading format
title: Book recommendations
description: Book recommendations based on genre

prompt: Suggest Travel itinerary for a {destination} destination, {style} style and  {budget} budget
title: Travel itinerary suggestions
description: Travel itinerary suggestions for a weekend getaway

prompt: Suggest DIY project ideas for home decor {room} room , {style} style and {skilllevel } skill level
title: DIY project ideas
description: DIY project ideas based on room, style , expertise

prompt: Gardening tips for {skilllevel} Skill Level, {type} Type of garden , {climate} climate for {space} like space
title: Gardening tips
description: Gardening tips  based on garden type, climate , space

prompt: What are the laws regarding {type} in {country1} and how do they differ from {country2}?
title: Laws Comparision
description: Compare Laws between Countries

prompt: What are the possible consequences for {customer} if they violate {type} in {country}?
title: Laws Consequences
description: Consequences of Laws

{metric}.title: Metric
{metric}.ui:placeholder: sales, website traffic, social media engagement

prompt: You are a marketer trying to increase {metric} for a {industry} company. What are some strategies you would recommend for targeting {demographic} customers who are interested in {interest}?
title: Digital Marketer
description: marketer trying to increase  Sales or website Traffic

{goal}.title: Goal
{goal}.ui:placeholder: weight loss, muscle gain, improved stamina

prompt: You are a fitness trainer designing a workout plan for a {goal} client. What exercises would you recommend for {bodypart} that target {skill} and improve {metric}?
title: Fitness Trainer
description: Fitness trainer designing a workout plan for client

prompt: You are planning a wedding and need ideas for {theme}. What are some decor elements, colors, and music genres that would complement {venue} and evoke {emotion}?
title: Wedding Theme Ideas
description: Planning a wedding and need ideas for theme

{fundingsource}.title: Funding Source
{fundingsource}.ui:placeholder: e.g. bootstrapped, venture capital, angel investors

prompt: Prepare a cash flow statement for a startup company considering {businessage} Business age, {fundingsource} Funding source and {businessmodel} Business Model
title: cash flow statement
description: Prepare a cash flow statement for a startup company.

title: Linux Terminal
description: Type command and reply from teminal will be shown as output
prompt: I want you to act as a linux terminal. I will type commands and you will reply with what the terminal should show. I want you to only reply with the terminal output inside one unique code block, and nothing else. do not write explanations. do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. When I need to tell you something in English, I will do so by putting text inside curly brackets {command}.

title: Regex Generator
description: Regular expression based on description with flavor
prompt: Create Regex from description delimited with triple backticks with {flavor} flavor. Output should be in format Regx and Explanation. Description: '''{description}'''

title: Compare Topic
description: Get diffrences with pros and cons
prompt: Compare {topic1} and {topic2} and give me atleast {count} diffrences with pros and cons in markdown table format

title: In Depth Explanation
description: Basic To Advanced
prompt: Act as Teach and explain {topic} , Provide output in below markdown format: {format}

title: Summarise the Text
description: easy and quick to understand
prompt: Summarise the text delimited with triple backticks ```{text}``` and output format summary:  in {count} words

title: Rewrite the Text
description: Convert into text that is Easy  to understand
prompt: Rewrite in easy and simple words the text delimited with triple backticks ```{text}```

title: Create MCQ type quiz
description: Question , options and correct answer
prompt: Create MCQ type quiz  from text delimited with triple backticks ```{text}```. output should be in markdown with format : Question , options and correct answer

title: Flashcards notes from text
description: Easy to remember notes
prompt: Create flashcards notes from text delimited with triple backticks ```{text}```.

title: Evaluate Answer
description: Act like teacher and evaluate my answer
prompt: Act like teacher and evaluate my answer delimited with triple backticks. Question: {question} Answer: ```{answer}```. Output in markdown format: correctness in true , false and partial , Percentage of correctness, Problem with answer only if answer is not correct

title: Create Study Plan
description: Comprehensive study Plan
prompt: Create study plan for a goal to '{topic}'  in {days} Days

{days}.title: Number of Days to Complete Study

description: Mnenomics with explanation
prompt: Create Mnenomics to remember {topic}} with explanation from {theme} theme

description: Topic Explainer in any Theme
prompt: Act like a teacher of {year} year old and explain the {topic} in {theme} theme

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.ui:placeholder: Enter Topic you want to learn

title: Cover letter  Generator
description: Using Company About us and Job description
prompt: Create Cover letter from given Company's About Us delimited by single quote, Job description delimited by double Quote and Resume Text delimited by triple backticks. Limit cover letter by max {letters} letters and My Name is {name}.About Us : '{aboutus}' Job Description :"{jobdescription}" Resume in Plain Text : ```{resume}```
